SEARCH
Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tickets.model.category

Class AbstractCategory

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tickets.model.category.AbstractCategory
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActiveTicketCategory, TicketCategory
public abstract class AbstractCategory extends Object
The AbstractCategory class defines base behavior for both the ActiveTicketCategory and the TicketCategory classes
Author:
Colin Fawcett, John Eakes

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractCategory

      public AbstractCategory(String categoryName, int completedCount)
      Constructor for the AbstractCategory class
      Parameters:
      categoryName - the desired name of the category
      completedCount - the number of completed tickets of the category
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the categoryName is null or empty
      IllegalArgumentException - if the completedCount is less than zero
